parameters.name: WitnessIndex
parameters.description: Index of linear dimension extension line whose jog to get

parameters.name: Jogged
parameters.description: True if the linear dimension extension line is jogged, false if not

parameters.name: Offset1
parameters.description: First line segment of the linear dimension extension line

parameters.name: Offset2
parameters.description: Second line segment of the linear dimension extension line; this is the line segment that is jogged

parameters.name: Offset1to2
parameters.description: Third line segment of the linear dimension extension line

title: IDisplayDimension.GetJogParameters
description: Gets the jog in a linear dimension extension line.
signature:
System.Boolean GetJogParameters( 
   System.Int16
WitnessIndex
,
   out System.Boolean
Jogged
,
   out System.Double
Offset1
,
   out System.Double
Offset2
,
   out System.Double
Offset1to2
)

parameters.name: WitnessIndex
parameters.description: Index of linear dimension extension line whose jog to get

parameters.name: Jogged
parameters.description: True if the linear dimension extension line is jogged, false if not

parameters.name: Offset1
parameters.description: First line segment of the linear dimension extension line

parameters.name: Offset2
parameters.description: Second line segment of the linear dimension extension line; this is the line segment that is jogged

parameters.name: Offset1to2
parameters.description: Third line segment of the linear dimension extension line

returns: True if the operation succeeds, false if not

examples.title: Add and Offset Dimension Extension Lines Jogs (VBA)
